title: The Bipedal Bear Is Back, Walking On Two Legs And Stealing The Heart Of A Nation
text:
The Bipedal Bear Is Back, Walking On Two Legs And Stealing The Heart Of A Nation 
Published By: Gawker.com - Yesterday 
The bipedal bear, the same one that captured the hearts and minds of a nation last year, is back.Read more
